abilities.name: Deploy Minions
abilities.desc: Release 4 minions into battle that have 30% of your Health and a percentage of your Damage.
abilities.level11UpgradeBonus: Using the power of music, your minions' health and damage are 20% higher.

abilities.name: Repair Drones
abilities.desc: Deploy 5 untargetable Repair Drones to heal for HPS each. When you deploy more drones or you are destroyed, your Repair Drones explode, doing healing each. These values increase with your Damage.

abilities.name: Assault Drones
abilities.desc: Deploy 5 untargetable Assault Drones that attack for DPS each. When you deploy more drones or you are destroyed, your Assault Drones explode, doing damage each. These values increase with your Damage.

abilities.name: Quick Strike
abilities.desc: Rush in, spreading electrical fire in a large radius. Targets are disabled for 6 seconds and take damage.

abilities.name: Sabotage
abilities.desc: Create a ring of fire that deals damage and prevents enemies from receiving shielding, and shoot bolts of electrical fire up to 8 times disabling and causing damage.

abilities.name: Inspiring Charge
abilities.desc: Rally Autobots to engage the target. Then charge in damaging walls along the way.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.desc: Shoots 4 rockets from long range delivering damage over the area around the target.

abilities.name: Healing Grenade
abilities.desc: Launch a grenade that heals all Autobots in a large area over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: EMP Bomb
abilities.desc: Throw an EMP Bomb that explodes stunning nearby targets for several seconds and deals 33% attack damage every second.

abilities.name: Glass Gas Rockets
abilities.desc: Shoots out 4 rockets that deal damage and engulf an area in Glass Gas, making all targets take an extra 40% damage for several seconds.

abilities.name: Sword Rush
abilities.desc: Rush into combat smashing walls along the way. Deals damage to the final target.

abilities.name: Electromagnetic Charge
abilities.desc: Put a shield that blocks 80% damage for several seconds and rush into combat damaging walls and leaving an Electromagnetic Pulse behind. Affected targets are disabled for several seconds. Attracts defenses!

abilities.name: Air Strike
abilities.desc: Fire 4 powerful rockets at a target building.

abilities.name: EMP Rocket Barrage
abilities.desc: Shoots out 6 rockets that disable enemy defenses and deal damage in a small area.

abilities.name: EMP Bomb
abilities.desc: Throw an EMP Bomb that explodes stunning nearby targets and deals attack damage.

abilities.name: Acid Bombs
abilities.desc: Drop 6 acid bombs on a target building each dealing large damage.

abilities.name: Incendiary Barrage
abilities.desc: Shoots 6 rockets that engulf a large area in flames dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Combat Stimulants
abilities.desc: Amplify movement and attack speeds of nearby Autobots for 8 seconds. (10 secs for the 5 star version)

abilities.name: Fusion Bomb
abilities.desc: Drop a fusion bomb on the target. If the target is destroyed within 20 seconds, the bomb explodes dealing massive damage to adjacent targets.

abilities.name: Bombing Run
abilities.desc: Drops 12 bombs in a line across the target dealing damage.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.desc: Call down a powerful Orbital Bombardment. Heavily damages every target in a large area.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.desc: Shoots 4 rockets from long range delivering damage over the area around the target.
